DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_ACTIVITY` ( `INSPECTION_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ACTIVITY_ID` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `EXTENSION_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`INSPECTION_ID`,`ACTIVITY_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_DICTIONARY` ( `TEST_ID` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `FIELD_ALIGNMENT` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `DATATYPE` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `UOM` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `REQUIRED` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `SELECT_LIST_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `VISIBLE` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `EXTENSION_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `FIELD_WIDTH` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `FIELD_MAX_CHARS` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TEST_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_EXTENSION` ( `EXTENSION_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `LINKED_TABLE` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `FIELDNAME` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `VALUE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`EXTENSION_ID`,`LINKED_TABLE`,`FIELDNAME`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_RESULT` ( `SAMPLE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `TEST_ID` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `VALUE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `UPDATED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `STATUS` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PROCESSED` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_ID`,`TEST_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_SAMPLE` ( `SAMPLE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `INSPECTION_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `ACTIVITY_ID` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `USER_DATA_1` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `USER_DATA_2` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_SELECTLIST` ( `SELECT_LIST_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `VALUE` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `SEQUENCE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SELECT_LIST_ID`,`VALUE`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_QM_TEST` ( `INSPECTION_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ACTIVITY_ID` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `TEST_ID` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `SEQUENCE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `EXTENSION_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`INSPECTION_ID`,`ACTIVITY_ID`,`TEST_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
ALTER TABLE `APP_PROCESS_ORDER` ADD COLUMN `INSPECTION_ID` VARCHAR(20) NULL AFTER `CUSTOMER_ID` ;
